structure.unit: B ADMISSION OF AN INDIVIDUAL WITH AN INTELLECTUAL DISABILITY

law.text: Upon recommendation or approval of the interdisciplinary team of an ICF/ID, a physician may admit for respite care an individual with an intellectual disability. Respite care provided to any individual with an intellectual disability under this section shall not exceed a total of thirty (30) days in any calendar year.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 60, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 28, effective July 13, 1990.
